A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: So\, this Is how a franchise dies...With thunderous reviews. All of the visuals of a Star Wars movie but none of the heart. Pointless sub-plots\, Weak premise. No hero's tale. No struggle to find one's self. I loved  \"The Force Awakens\" and \"Rogue One\". But what they did in this installment makes one believe there is no hope for the 3rd installment\,
